title: Non-Disney Nunu Skins Please

embed.description: ↑ Nunu& Willump's profile page at LeagueOfLegends.com

body:
Nunu's old personality was entirely different before the rework. He had a bit of evil in him and a smirk to go with it. That's what I liked. Willump was a ferocious beast, not a cuddly teddy bear. Even Demolisher Nunu isn't scary or intimidating. The only Nunu skin I like anymore is Zombie Nunu but it's Legacy and I can't buy it.

If Riot is going to not just rework a champion but change everything about their personality on top of it, we need some skins with the old personality. When I play Nunu now, it's like I'm in Frozen or some other Disney movie. Overly happy, sappy and whimsical... the opposite of what I liked in this particular champion. I don't want a gentle beast and a friendly little boy on a fun and pleasant adventure. I don't even recognize this Nunu anymore or Willump... it's like they both had lobotomies. 

Here's a bit of the old Nunu & Willump:

https://leagueoflegends.fandom.com/wiki/File:Nunu_SasquatchLoading_old.jpg

[Evil arrogant boy with a hellish beast]

new Nunu & Willump:

https://i.imgur.com/p4sYuKr.jpg

[Impossibly cute Yeti toy filling in for absentee father]


What's next, is Annie going to be cheerfully having a blast with her nice bear from hell? Is Shaco going to be showing up to little kids' birthday parties and making balloon animals? :D

replies.body: Should go in story, art & sound

> [{quoted}](name=Rathar Dashing,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vufa36PJ,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-01-24T04:00:32.222+0000)
>
> Should go in story, art & sound

I'd be happy if a mod moved it.

> [{quoted}](name=Bârd,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vufa36PJ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-01-24T02:38:08.942+0000)
>
> Demolisher Nunu, Zombie Nunu.

Demolisher Nunu is still the same style of voiceovers as the main skin. It looks different but the theme hasn't change really.

Zombie Nunu is good though.

Forget Disney Nunu {{champion:20}} 

Remember Disco Nunu {{champion:20}}
